title: [SOLD] Intel Solid State Disk X25 Mainstream G2 80GB

posts.text:
Er með til sölu tæp mánaðargamlann Intel SSD X25-Mainstream G2 80GB.
Diskur er í ábyrgð og lítið sem ekkert notaður. 
Búið er að uppfæra í nýjasta firmware.
Mynd: 
http://skattertech.com/media/2009/12/wo ... 5mg2-2.jpg
Þetta er græjan sem er efst á þessum lista: 
http://www.harddrivebenchmark.net/common_drives.html
Tilboð Óskast !
Model Name  
•Intel® X18-M Mainstream SATA Solid-State Drive
•Intel® X25-M Mainstream SATA Solid-State Drive
 
Capacity  80GB and 160GB  
NAND flash components  
•10 Parallel Channel Architecture with 34nm MLC ONFI 1.0 NAND (34nm)
•10 Parallel Channel Architecture with 50nm MLC ONFI 1.0 NAND (50nm)
 
Bandwidth  
•Sustained Sequential Read: up to 250MB/s
•Sustained Sequential Write:
◦up to 70MB/s
 
Read latency  
•65 microseconds (34nm)
•85 microseconds (50nm)
 
Write latency  
•85 microseconds (34nm)
•115 microseconds (50nm)
 
Random I/O Operations per Second (IOPS)¹  
•Random 4KB Reads: up to 35,000 IOPS (34nm and 50nm)
•Random 4KB Writes: 80GB X25/X18-M: up to 6,600 IOPS (34nm): up to 3,300 IOPS (50nm)
•Random 4KB Writes: 160GB X25/X18-M: up to 8,600 IOPS (34nm): up to 3,300 IOPS (50nm)
 
Interface  SATA 1.5 Gb/s and 3.0 Gb/s  
Form factor, height and weight  
•X25-M: 2.5" Industry Standard Hard Drive Form Factor
◦7mm - 76 grams +/- 2 grams
◦9.5mm - 80 grams +/- 2 grams 
 
Life expectancy  1.2 million hours Mean Time Before Failure (MTBF)  
Power consumption  
•Active: 150mW Typical (PC workload²)
•Idle (DIPM): 75mW Typical (34nm)
•Idle (DIPM): 60mW Typical (50nm)
 
Operating shock  
•1,500G / 0.5ms (34nm)
•1,000G / 0.5ms (50nm)
 
Operating temperature  0°C to +70°C  
Compatibility and compliance  SATA Revision 2.6 Compliant. Compatible with SATA 3.0 Gb/s with Native Command Queuing and SATA 1.5 Gb/s interface rates 
This product has been certified compliant by the following organizations:
 
RoHS compliance  Meets the requirements of EU RoHS Compliance Directives
(50nm and 34 nm) and the Halogen Free Compliance Directives (34nm)  
Product health monitoring  Self-Monitoring, Analysis and Reporting Technology (S.M.A.R.T.) commands plus additional Intel® Solid State monitoring
Hvar er hann keyptur og áttu nótu?

Verðhugmynd?
Skipti? Ef svo, á hverju helst?
Get alveg reddað því ef þú býður í þetta af viti.

ok.
Byrja að bjóða 35.000. Ertu á höfuðborgasvæðinu?
Er fyrir norðan, en get sent myndir af öllu sásamt ábyrgðarnótu. Get sent búnað með flugi séi þess óskað. (viðtakandi greiðir kostnað)

Geturu sent mér myndir?
annars þá er ég tilbúinn að kaupa þetta.
Já ekkert mál, á hvaða netfang á ég að senda myndir ?
